summary: This bill, the Headache Education, Access, Diagnosis, and Care Health Equity Act (HEADACHE Act), aims to address headache disorders through a National Headache Disorders Initiative (NHDI). It mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish and implement a nationwide program for research, care coordination, and public awareness.  The bill also establishes an Advisory Council on Headache Disorders Research, Care, and Services.  It requires data sharing among federal agencies, and mandates annual reports to Congress regarding headache disorders, including recommendations and a national plan. The act sunsets five years after enactment.
